title: Businessweek Extra-Jim Steyer
itunes:title: Businessweek Extra-Jim Steyer
description:
Jim Steyer, Founder and CEO of Common Sense Media, discusses his new book "Which Side of History: How Technology Is Reshaping Democracy and Our Lives."

Hosts: Carol Massar and Paul Sweeney. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
